com.solidfire.serialization

Class OptionalAdapter

  • Object
    • OptionalAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JsonDeserializer<Optional<?>>, JsonSerializer<Optional<?>>

    public class OptionalAdapter
extends Object
implements JsonSerializer<Optional<?>>, JsonDeserializer<Optional<?>>
    Handles serializing and deserializing Optional objects.

                    Type type,
                    JsonSerializationContext context)
        Serializes an Optional object.

        serialize in interface JsonSerializer<Optional<?>>

      • deserialize

        public Optional<?> deserialize(JsonElement json,
                      Type typeOfT,
                      JsonDeserializationContext context)
        Deserializes an Optional object.
        Specified by:
        deserialize in interface JsonDeserializer<Optional<?>>
        Parameters:
        json - the element to deserialize.
        typeOfT - type of the expected return value.
        context - Context used for deserialization.
        Returns:
        An Optional object containing an object of type typeOfT.
